Parameter.value: root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name = '_Total'

PluginResultMetaInfo.columns: 会话ID,用户名,用户ID,用户进程ID,主机名,tty端口,用户连接时间,进程名,会话池指针

Parameter.value: setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;cat /var/run/dmesg.boot | grep -i "real memory" | awk '{printf "%d",$4/1024}'
root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Thread where Name like 'onscpah%'
root\cimv2::select name from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfOS_Processor where name !='_Total'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;UNIX95= ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' |egrep ${InstanceName}|egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $3}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
LANG=en_US.utf8;UNIX95= ps -eo 'pcpu comm args' |egrep ${InstanceName}|egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
root\cimv2::select WorkingSet from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'onscpah%'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pmem comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
setenv LANG en_US.UTF-8;ps -aux | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $4}'
LANG=en_US.UTF-8;ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'pmem comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
ps -eo 'vsz comm args' | egrep ${InstanceName} | egrep -v egrep | awk '{print $1}'
select dbinfo('version', 'full') from systables where tabid = 1
select cf_original from sysconfig where cf_name='ROOTNAME'
select cf_original from sysconfig where cf_name='ROOTPATH'
select trim(cf_original) from sysconfig where cf_name='BUFFERS'
select trim(cf_original) from sysconfig where cf_name='SHMVIRTSIZE'
select round(decode((a.value+b.value),0,0,100*a.value/(a.value+b.value)),2) from sysprofile a,sysprofile b where a.name='bufreads' and b.name='dskreads'
select trim(cf_original) from sysconfig where cf_name='DBSERVERNAME'
select round(decode((a.value+b.value),0,0,100*a.value/(a.value+b.value)),2) from sysprofile a,sysprofile b where a.name='bufreads' and b.name='dskreads'
select round(decode((a.value+b.value),0,0,100*a.value/(a.value+b.value)),2) from sysprofile a,sysprofile b where a.name='bufwrites' and b.name='dskwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='buffwts'
select value from sysprofile where name='pagreads'
select value from sysprofile where name='lruwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='seqscans'
select value from sysprofile where name='latchwts'
select value from sysprofile where name='flushes'
select value from sysprofile where name='fgwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='chunkwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='memsorts'
select value from sysprofile where name='disksorts'
select value from sysprofile where name='numckpts'
select value from sysprofile where name='ckptwts'
select value from sysprofile where name='iscommits'
select value from sysprofile where name='isrollbacks'
select value from sysprofile where name='lockreqs'
select value from sysprofile where name='deadlks'
select value from sysprofile where name='lockwts'
select value from sysprofile where name='lktouts'
select value from sysprofile where name='dskreads'
select value from sysprofile where name='dskwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='pagreads'
select value from sysprofile where name='pagwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='llgrecs'
select value from sysprofile where name='llgpagewrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='llgwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='plgwrites'
select value from sysprofile where name='plgpagewrites'
SELECT count(*) FROM systables WHERE (tabtype= 'T ' or tabtype = 'V ') and (tabid > 99)
select sum( ti_npused) from systabinfo where ti_partnum in (select partnum from systabnames where dbsname='${childid}')
select trim(cf_original) from sysconfig where cf_name='DBSERVERNAME'
select trim(name),sum(b.chksize)/1024,round(sum(b.chksize-b.nfree)/sum(b.chksize)*100,2) from sysdbspaces a,syschunks b where a.dbsnum=b.dbsnum group by a.name
select trim(name),sum(b.chksize),round(sum(b.chksize-b.nfree)/sum(b.chksize)*100,2) from sysdbspaces a,syschunks b where a.dbsnum=b.dbsnum group by a.name

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,round(((sum(chksize) - sum(nfree))/sum(chksize))*100) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,round(((sum(chksize) - sum(nfree))/sum(chksize))*100) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc
select trim(s.name),trim(f.fname) from sysdbspaces s,syschunks f where s.dbsnum=f.dbsnum

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,round(((sum(chksize) - sum(nfree))/sum(chksize))*100) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,(sum(chksize) - sum(nfree)) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,round(((sum(chksize) - sum(nfree))/sum(chksize))*100) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc

select trim(name) dbspace,trim(owner), sum(chksize) allocated, sum(nfree) free,round(((sum(chksize) - sum(nfree))/sum(chksize))*100) pcused from sysdbspaces d, syschunks c where d.dbsnum = c.dbsnum group by name,owner order by pcused desc
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum

select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),sh.sh_pagesize from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c,sysshmvals sh where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum

select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),sh.sh_pagesize from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c,sysshmvals sh where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
select f.chknum,nvl(trim(s.name),''),f.chksize,f.offset,f.nfree,trim(f.fname),trim(f.mfname),c.reads,c.writes from syschunks f,sysdbspaces s,syschkio c where f.dbsnum=s.dbsnum and c.chunknum=f.chknum
